name: algorithms-midterm-study
description: Scheduling a study group for the Algorithms II midterm.

events.content: Need to schedule another Algorithms II study groupâ€”midterm is next Thursday. When works?
Monday 7-9 p.m. works if we grab room 14-238.
I'll set up a Doodle poll so we can include the remote folks. Vote by tonight and I'll book whichever slot wins.
Please include one morning slot; some of us TA at night.
Poll posted: https://doodle.com/algos-midterm. Vote vote vote.
